Package org.drip.measure.distribution

R1 Rd Continuous Random Measure
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    I1ContinuousUniform
    I1ContinuousUniform implements the Univariate Bounded Uniform Integer Distribution, with the Integer being generated between a (n inclusive) lower and an upper Bound.
    R1Continuous
    R1Continuous exposes the Base Abstract Class behind continuous R1 Distributions.
    R1ContinuousPareto
    R1ContinuousPareto implements the R1 Continuous Pareto Distribution.
    R1ContinuousPowerLaw
    R1ContinuousPowerLaw implements the R1 Continuous Power Law Distribution.
    R1ContinuousUniform
    R1ContinuousUniform implements the Univariate R1 Uniform, i.
    R1ContinuousUniformPiecewiseDisplaced
    R1ContinuousUniformPiecewiseDisplaced implements the Continuous Uniform Displaced Piecewise Linear R1 Distributions.
    R1ContinuousUniformPiecewiseLinear
    R1ContinuousUniformPiecewiseLinear implements the Piecewise Linear R1 Distributions.
    R1Discrete
    R1Discrete implements the Discrete Distribution over the Combinatorial R1 Outcomes.
    R1R1Continuous
    R1R1Continuous implements the Base Abstract Class behind Bivariate R1 Distributions.
    RdContinuous
    RdContinuous implements the Base Abstract Class behind Rd Distributions.
    RdR1Continuous
    RdR1Continuous implements the Base Abstract Class behind Rd X R1 Distributions.
